strings.page_1: Akarongo k'ibara kagaragara kugice cyo hejuru, kerekana ko igikoresho kifashishwa mu gusuma gikora neza. Ako karongo niko kitwa Control Line (C).
strings.page_2: Akandi karongo k'ibara kagaragara kugice cyo hasi. Ako karongo kitwa Test line ya COVID (T).
strings.page_3: Nubwo akarongo kambere (Control line C) katagaragara neza, n'aka kabiri (Test line T) katagaragara neza, isuzuma ryakozwe rifatwa nk'iryagenze neza, n'ibisubizo biba ari ibigaragaza ubwandu bwa COVID-19 (POSITIVE).
strings.page_5:
Afite ubwandu bwa COVID-19

Kuba akarongo byibuze kamwe kagaragara, bivuze ko afite ubwandu bwa COVID-19.

Ibisubizo by'uko afite ubwandu bwa COVID-19 (POSITIVE) bikwiye guhuzwa n'amakuru aba yatwanzwe kugirango bihabwe agaciro
